name: Serum Beta-2 Microglobulin Pretreatment Level
title: Serum Beta-2 Microglobulin Pretreatment Level
notes:
**Note 1:** Serum microglobulin is part of the Revised International Staging (RISS). Use the cut points listed in the table below regardless of the lab’s reference range.

**Note 2:** Record this data item based on a blood test performed at diagnosis (pre-treatment). In the absence of the lab test, a physician’s statement of the exact value can be used. Use the highest value available. 

**Note 3:** If there is no mention of the serum beta-2 microglobulin, code 9.
rows: Test ordered, results not in chart
